content: @Philip Durbin I guess this is the robotics event you were talking about yesterday: https://www.massrobotics.org/roboboston/, which is indeed this Saturday at Seaport
My Saturday is pretty busy. We need to drive out to the farm in the morning and then we have friends playing at Brookline Porchfest at 1pm. I'm not sure I'll make it to RoboBoston. :grimacing:
How did they not call it Roboston
Oh there's a Brookline Porchfest! These things are exploding. Portsmouth NH just had their first. It was a bit rainy so it wasn't too attended but it was nice. Also went to Plum Island.
